frontmatter.title: Data Warehousing for Dummies Series: An ETL Pimer for Business
frontmatter.short: Data is the new currency of business. When you invest in a data warehouse you need to fill it. ELT tools help you do that. These tools leverage automation. Use them.
frontmatter.keywords: data warehousing for dummies pdf, data warehousing for dummies, data warehouse for dummies, cloud data warehousing for dummies
frontmatter.hero_alt: Data Warehousing for Dummies Series: An ETL Primer for Business
